root_cause: Out of memory condition causing container termination
justification: OOM alerts indicate memory exhaustion requiring immediate scaling to distribute load and prevent further crashes

root_cause: CPU spike detected with high severity but no container or log details available
justification: High severity CPU spike typically indicates resource exhaustion requiring immediate horizontal scaling to distribute load

root_cause: Container experiencing out-of-memory condition causing OOM kill
justification: OOM alerts indicate memory exhaustion requiring immediate container restart to restore service availability

root_cause: CPU spike detected with high severity but insufficient diagnostic information
justification: High severity CPU spike typically indicates resource exhaustion or increased load; scaling up provides immediate relief while maintaining service availability

root_cause: Database connection failure with high severity alert
justification: DB connection issues typically require service restart to re-establish connection pools and clear stale connections
Disk space critical alert requires immediate capacity expansion to prevent service disruption and data loss

root_cause: Pod crash with no available logs or container information
justification: Critical pod crash requires immediate restart to restore service availability, despite lack of diagnostic information

root_cause: Container experiencing out-of-memory condition causing OOM kill
justification: OOM alerts indicate memory exhaustion requiring immediate container restart to restore service availability
